name: The Rewinder (Komes)
description:
A game by Kostya Mescheryakov, music by evan king ( used 20xx [high enegy chiptune (biscuits)]

Big thanks to Artem Zorin, who playtested and gave me some valuable feedback;

Controls:

Move wih WASD;

  Left Click to choot

  R to REWIND, if rewinder is ready and not broken,

  To buy upgrades, click on them

  Destroying boxes will give you coins;

Just another top-down shooter... Or is it?

You are a counter-terrorrist in the geometrical world, and a scientists, who just invented a device, that can rewind time!

Start with a weak weapon, rewind time,buy upgrades, become stronger!

Good luck!

And trry not to smash your computer when you lose....
